availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Henry Laffoon (Hopkins Co., KY, farmer)

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Rutherford Laffoon and Sarah Laffoon. Married to Zerilda Laffoon. Father of William E. Laffoon, George Laffoon, Lucinda L. Laffoon, Euria F. Laffoon, Nathan Etta Laffoon, and Charles Laffoon. Farmer in Hopkins County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Hopkins County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, District 1, p. 57B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, p. 599-600.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, Charleston, p. 110B.
